name: Maze Miner
description:
V0.1.0 beta

This game is in development and is using some placeholder sprites.

Currently there is no sound or saved progress.

Aiming is a bit rough...

It may slow down in deeper levels.

Please let me know what you think and check back later for updates.

WASD keys: movement

Arrow keys: movement

F: throw torch

G: throw Gold

H: throw Pickaxe

K: destroys all walls (for debugging purposes)

Gameplay tips

Find the dwarf (or their corpse) to trade for the key.  (the key may also be found on the floor if it was thrown and not caught.

Find the trapdoor to the next level.  (It may be hidden behind a wall)

If you run out of torches you will die in 10 seconds.

If you die you will respawn on the current level (and be invincible for a few seconds).  Your loot should be wherever you were killed.

If you get stuck, consider throwing away your torches so you respawn with more equipment.  thrown torches will drop as loot when they hit a wall so you can recover them.

If you die suddenly for no apparent reason, it may not be a bug...  watch out for hidden monsters (that are extra hidden due to incomplete sound and animation cues).

...The rest I want you to figure out...
